meanings.definition: A Hindu festival celebrated in South India.
meanings.sent1: During Pongal, families gather to celebrate together.
meanings.sent2: The Pongal festival is a time of joy and togetherness.
meanings.sent3: At Pongal, everyone enjoys delicious food and dances.
meanings.sent4: The spirit of Pongal brings warmth and happiness to all.
meanings.sent5: The colors and sounds of Pongal create a festive atmosphere.

meanings.definition: A dish made of rice and lentils, typically cooked with spices and vegetables.
meanings.sent1: My mom makes the best Pongal with her secret recipe.
meanings.sent2: Pongal is a flavorful and nutritious meal enjoyed by many.
meanings.sent3: I always look forward to a hot bowl of Pongal on a cold day.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of Pongal cooking fills the kitchen with comfort.
meanings.sent5: The creamy texture of Pongal melts in your mouth with every bite.
